properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, WRITER_NO, b.STATUS FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER ON (WRITER_NO = USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "TOTAL" FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER ON (WRITER_NO = USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND b.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REPORT B WHERE B.STATUS='Y') A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND BOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '일반게시판'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '나눔게시판'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '공지사항'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '입양후기'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS='Y' AND FAQ_CATEGORY = '입양문의'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS='Y' AND FAQ_CATEGORY = '후원문의'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS='Y' AND FAQ_CATEGORY = '기타문의'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_NO LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NAME LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS='Y' AND FAQ_TITLE LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS='Y' AND FAQ_NO LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ B JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NAME LIKE ?
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE FAQ SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BOARD_CATEGORY = '나눔게시판' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BOARD_CATEGORY = '일반게시판' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BOARD_CATEGORY = '공지사항' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM,USER_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BOARD_CATEGORY = '입양후기' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM,USER_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.FAQ_CATEGORY = '입양문의' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM,USER_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.FAQ_CATEGORY = '후원문의' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.FAQ_CATEGORY = '기타문의' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BOARD_NO LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND USER_NAME LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND FAQ_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.FAQ_NO LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_NAME LIKE ?
INSERT INTO BOARD( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, WRITER_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, STATUS )VALUES('BO' || SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE,0,'Y')
INSERT INTO FAQ( FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CATEGORY, USER_NO, FAQ_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, STATUS )VALUES('FA' || SEQ_FAQ_NO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE,0,'Y')
INSERT INTO REPORT( REPORT_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_NO, STATUS )VALUES('RO' || SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL,?,SYSDATE,?,'Y')
SELECT BOARD_NO,B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE,M.USER_NAME,COUNT,WRITER_NO,BOARD_CATEGORY FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FAQ_NO,B.FAQ_TITLE, B.FAQ_CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE,M.USER_NAME,COUNT,USER_NO,B.FAQ_CATEGORY FROM FAQ B JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) WHERE B.FAQ_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET STATUS = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_CATEGORY = ?, BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT =? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_CATEGORY = ?, FAQ_TITLE = ?, FAQ_CONTENT =? WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO,REPLY_CONTENT,CREATE_DATE,BOARD_NO,STATUS,REPLY_WRITER) VALUES('REPLY' || SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL,?,SYSDATE,?,'Y',?)
SELECT REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY FILE_NO
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, CATEGORY_NO, STATUS ) VALUES('AT' || SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, 'BO' || SEQ_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL,?,?,?,?,'Y')
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, CATEGORY_NO, STATUS ) VALUES('AT' || SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,?,'Y')
DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,RNUM,USER_ID FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, USER_NAME,BOARD_CATEGORY,USER_ID,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = WRITER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND FAQ.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,RNUM,USER_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME,FAQ_CATEGORY,COUNT,USER_NAME,RNUM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FAQ B WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
